loans.name: Ekomefeemo Group

texts.en:
The Ekomefeemo Group consists of three people from the same neighborhood. They sell fried fish, fried yams, fresh fish, and kenkey (cooked corn paste).
The representative for the group, Gladys, is standing on the left in the picture. This is the sixth time that this group has sought financial support from ID Ghana, seeking to raise the level of their business activities.

Gladys is 51 years old and single. Her children are grown up and are living on their own. Gladys lives alone in a family house.

To take care of her household needs, Gladys has been selling fried yams and fish for seven years. 

Wanting to reinforce her business and better respond to customers' demands, Gladys is requesting a sixth loan, along with the other members of the Ekomefeemo Group. All previous loans have been repaid in full.

loans.use: to buy yams and fish to fry and sell to customers.

loans.name: Maria Carmen

texts.es: Carmen de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia con su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 18, 12 y 5 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien posee un molino de nixtamal en el cual muchas personas la buscan para moler diferentes   granos como: maíz, arroz, frijol, etc. además posee un vehículo que utiliza para realizar viajes lo que le permite percibir un ingreso extra. Carmen desea construir un cuarto en su propiedad por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina galvanizada y polines para la construcción del cuarto.
texts.en: Carmen, age 36, lives in her own home with her husband and their three children, ages 18, 12 and 5 years. She's a hard working woman who owns a nixtamal grinder, a grinder that processes corn with limewater and hulls it. Lots of people seek her out to grind various things, mostly grains such as corn, rice, and beans. She also owns a vehicle that she uses to make trips, which earns her a little extra income. Carmen wants to build a room on their land, which is why she has come to FUSAI. She will use the loan to buy sheet metal and beams for the construction.

loans.use: buy sheet metal and beams to build a room

loans.name: Andriansyah

texts.en:
Meet Andriansyah. He is a hardworking and humble man who runs a small stall that sells mobile airtime credits and serves bill payments for his customers. 

Andriansyah is married and has a son. He and his wife run the business together to meet the family's needs. They live in Cianjur, a small town situated at the foot of Gede-Pangrango volcanoes in West Java. Andriansyah began working with Ruma six months ago because he wanted to increase his family's income. Other than that, he is also interested in mobile technology. 

As a Ruma agent, Andriansyah has been performing well; his mobile airtime sales can take up to 40 transactions per day and are expected to grow more. As the business runs, he needs a working capital loan from Kiva to process more transactions. In the future, Andriansyah is planning to seek more business opportunities.

loans.use: To process more mobile airtime credits sales on the weekends.

loans.name: Luz Angelica

texts.es: Luz de 33 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijas de 6 y 3 años de edad. Ella es una mujer que en su afán por tener mas ingresos económicos presta sus servicios domésticos con lo que apoya económicamente a su familia. Luz desea construir un cuarto para la cocina ya que como se observa en la fotografía esta se encuentra desprotegida, además desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda que se encuentra en mal estado por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar teja, madera y vara de castilla para construir el cuarto de la cocina
texts.en: Luz, age 33, lives with her husband and their two daughters, ages 6 and 3 years. In her drive to earn some money, Luz sells her services as a household employee, which is how she supports her family. Luz wants to build a room for the kitchen, since as you can see in the picture, it is currently unprotected. She also wants to replace the roof of their home since it's in poor condition. With the loan from FUSAI, she will buy tile, wood, and wooden slats to build her kitchen.

loans.use: buy materials to build a room for her kitchen

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough flour, butter, coal, and other baking supplies to sell.

loans.name: Nana

texts.en:
Nana is a 53-year-old woman from the village of Kolobani. She lives with her sister and brother-in-law, who also have two children. Sadly, because of lack of economic resources and because she had to start working at a very young age, Nana was unable to study a professional career. She works hard on the family-owned agricultural land, growing vegetables that are sold to local retailers for a good price. The agricultural activity is the only source of income for this five-member family. 

As the family has only seasonal income, Nana decided to start dairy farming and seek credit among local financial institutions, but her attempts were unsuccessful because of her poor living conditions. The startup program, which is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables rural poor people to get a loan for starting or re-starting businesses. Her application was approved under the framework of this program to get a loan of $2,200 for purchasing two milk cows.  After the cows are purchased, the family will start producing dairy products like cheese and yogurt for selling. They will also use the milk products for feeding the family.

loans.use: To purchase two milk cows.

loans.name: Pramila

texts.en:
Pramila, who is 54 years old, is a very committed and hardworking woman who has a lot of dreams for herself and her family. She has three children (one son and two daughters), one of whom is a student in college. They live in the small village of Magurmari in the district of Jalpaiguri. She is illiterate and can only sign her name, but her husband studied until grade 9.

Pramila's husband, Debendranath, is engaged in agricultural activities. He mainly grows paddy. Pramila helps her husband in different jobs every day to keep their crops healthy, which is an arduous and difficult job that is worthwhile at the end of the season.

Pramila's family's income depends on this agribusiness. Her husband has many years of experience in this job, which he learned from his father. The land is his own, an inheritance from his parents. With the growing expenses of his family, he needs to expand his business by cultivating paddy in larger quantities. This will not only meet the customers' demands but also earn an additional profit. 

They need financial help, so Pramila is seeking a loan from BJS (a Kiva partner) to purchase more quality seeds and fertilizers to better cultivate paddy. She hopes for good revenue to meet all her dreams.

She wants to support her children in their studies so that they can become excellent professionals. She also aspires to build a concrete-made better house for them with the profit because the house in which they are living at present is lacking all the minimum amenities.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers for cultivating paddy.

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назире 32 года, замужем, есть дочь. У Назиры- среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством, стартовав в 2004 году. Благодаря упорному труду Назиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы и 6 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Назира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец с целью их откорма и дальнейшей перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Назира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Nazira is 32 years old, married and has a daughter. Nazira has a secondary education and, to provide the primary source of income for her family, has been involved in animal husbandry since 2004. Thanks to Nazira's hard work, today her business contains 2 dairy cows and 6 sheep. The monthly income amounts to 7,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Nazira requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy sheep for subsequent fattening up and resale. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy sheep for subsequent fattening up and resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy parts for his vehicle and perform maintenance on it

loans.name: Félix Noel

texts.es:
El joven Félix Noel tiene la edad de 29 años, habita en el municipio de El Sauce donde nació y creció en el seno de una familia humilde y trabajadora.
Desde muy pequeño dejó la escuela y optó por trabajar y emigrar hacia El Salvador en busca de empleo y ayudarle a su madre para salir adelante.
Inicialmente con esfuerzo propio logró comprar un tricitaxi con el que trabajó por muchos años y hace dos años una micro financiera le financió una Mototaxi con el que día a día se gana la vida brindando el servicio de acarreo de carga y de pasajeros.
Félix es un joven con muchos deseos de superación que se sacrifica por trabajar arduamente, ya que su gran sueño es llegar a tener una vivienda digna para darles una vida mejor a su hija y su esposa.
Se siente muy agradecido con Kiva y Ceprodel porque durante muchos años lo han apoyado con los financiamientos que le han servido de mucho para mejorar su vida.
En este momento Félix tiene la necesidad de un crédito para la compra de llantas y la carpa con el fin de brindarles a sus clientes un mejor servicio.
Espera y confía en Dios le sigan apoyando.
texts.en:
Félix Noel, age 29, lives in the town of El Sauce, where he grew up among his hard-working, humble family. He left school at a young age, choosing to work instead, emigrating to El Salvador in search of work and helping his mother get ahead. Early on, through his own hard work, he managed to buy a tricycle taxi, which he used for work for many years. Two years ago, through a microfinancier, he managed to obtain a motor taxi, which he currently uses to make his living by moving people and cargo. Félix is a young man with a great desire to get ahead. He has sacrificed and worked hard, and now his great dream is to have a dignified home where he can provide his wife and daughter with a better life.

He's very grateful to Kiva and to Ceprodel because they have supported him for many years with financing that has helped him to improve his life. At this time, Félix needs a loan which he will use for the purchase of tires and a tent covering. These will help him provide his customers with better service. He hopes and trusts in God that the support he has received will continue

loans.use: buy tires and a tent covering for his motor taxi

loans.name: Rigoberto Antonio

texts.es: Rigoberto de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar conformado por sus padres, su esposa y sus hijos, el se dedica a la albañilería y realizar trabajos de soldadura  electricidad, con lo que gana de sus trabajos ayuda a solventar algunas necesidades de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo unos cuartos pero con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón decidió solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL  un crédito para comprar cemento, arena, hierro, ladrillos, cerámica, etc. y así poder construir lo que necesita para que el y su familia puedan vivir cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is 30 years old and lives in his own house with his parents, wife and children. He works in construction doing electric welding. With the money he earns, he pays for household necessities. 

Rigoberto wishes to improve his house by adding further rooms but he cannot afford to do this on his wages. Therefore he decided to seek a loan from INTEGRAL to buy cement, bricks, tiles etc. so he can build what he needs, and his family can live more comfortably and safely.

loans.use: Buy cement, sand, rebar, bricks, tiles etc.

loans.name: Orbelina

texts.es: Orbelina de 52 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con dos hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura, cultiva maíz y maicillo, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside con lo que vende ayuda a solventar algunas de las necesidades de su hogar, Orbelina solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar insumos agrícolas como: semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc.  y asi poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Orbelina, 52 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with two children. She has been a farmer for 10 years. She grows corn and sorghum and sells her produce in the area around where she lives. With what she sells, she helps cover some of her household's necessities. Orbelina is asking for a loan from Integral in order to buy agricultural supplies such as: seed, fertilizer, manure, pest control products, etc., and in this way be able to give her family a better quality of life with no limitations.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, manure, pest control products, etc.

loans.name: Alpana

texts.en:
Alpana is a rural housewife from Maynaguri. She is only 21 years old, and married to her husband Harimohan. They live in their own kachha house (a house made of mud, bamboo, and straw).  She studied until grade 9 and her husband until grade 8.

Alpana's husband runs a grocery store. It is adjacent to their house. Her husband is an active and hardworking man who transformed his decade-old grocery shop, which significantly increased his profit and saved his family from an adverse financial situation. He gets active support from his wife Alpana, who also looks after the shop, while also managing household jobs. They sell daily necessities. They decided to expand their business in order to generate more income.

Alpana wishes to offer her customers a better variety of products by stocking up her business with grocery items such as rice, edible oil, biscuits, flour, salt, and sugar in order to generate better income for the family. She is very simple and polite, so her customers like her very much. This is the reason she is asking for the loan from BJS (a Kiva partner). It will allow her to continue her business and satisfy her customers.

She is a very hardworking woman and a dreamer; she wishes to grow her business for a secure life.  She also wants to save money from her profit to construct a better and decent house for them. She is very much thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase grocery items for her existing grocery store.

loans.name: Oscar Ovidio

texts.es: Oscar de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su  esposa,  su madre y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años principalmente al cultivo de maíz, comercializa en las agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunas necesidades de que se le presentan en su hogar, Oscar esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, foliares, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para continuar con sus cultivos, y asi poder tener junto con su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Oscar, 47 years old, lives in his own house with his wife, his mother, and his two children. He has been a farmer for several years, mainly growing corn. He sells at the agencies for buying and selling staple grains that are near his house. With what he earns from his sales, he is able to cover some of his household's necessities. Oscar is asking for a loan in order to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, plant fertilizers, etc., and to improve the land that is shown in the photograph in order to continue with his crops, and in this way be able to have better economic stability for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, plant fertilizers, etc., and to improve the land

loans.name: Mauricio Antonio

texts.es: Mauricio de 45 años de edad, desde hace 10 años se dedica al cultivo de maíz, caña de azúcar y maicillo, esos años le han dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, tiene clientela ya establecida por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, Mauricio solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas,  foliares, etc. y así poder tener junto a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Mauricio, 45 years old, has grown corn, sugar cane, and sorghum for 10 years. Those years have given him the capacity and the knowledge necessary to care for his crops. He has an established clientele due to the quality of the products and the good prices. With what he earns from his sales, he is able to cover some of his household's expenses. He lives in his own house with his family. Mauricio is asking for a loan in order to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, manure, pest control products, herbicides, plant fertilizers, etc., and in this way be able to have a better quality of life along with his family, with no limitations.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, pest control products, herbicides, plant fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: El Banquito Del Ahorro Group

texts.es: Harry es un joven de 30 años, soltero y pertenece al grupo El Banquito del Ahorro. De lunes a viernes trabaja como armador soldador en un taller de soldadura; pero también tiene un negocio propio el cual lo lleva a la par de su trabajo dependiente, este es en la venta de micas para motos. El ha invertido el préstamo para comprar micas de diferente calidad y herramientas como desarmadores, llaves, entre otros. Se siente muy contento de haber obtenido el préstamo y agradece de corazón a los inversionistas de KIVA por la ayuda y confianza que le han brindado, es una persona muy hábil y emprendedora y dice que gracias a los inversionistas el podrá realizar su sueño.
texts.en:
Harry is a 30-year-old young man, is single, and belongs to the "El Banquito del Ahorro" group.  He is working from Monday to Friday as an assembler welder; but he also has his own business of selling mica motorcycle helmets. He is requesting this loan to purchase mica motorcycle helmets of different quality and tools like screwdrivers, keys, and others. 

He is very excited to obtain the loan and is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for the support and trust that they have offered him.  He is a very skillful and enterprising man and says that thanks to the lenders he will be able to realize his dream.

loans.use: to purchase mica motorcycle helmets to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “Mujeres Emprendedoras”, la socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de verduras, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como zanahorias, lechugas, zanahorias entre otros, la socia continua vendiendo en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del cusco a todos sus clientes que le socitran, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito  para la compra de zapallo entre otros entre otros.

La socia está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse en su actividad y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
This Señora belongs to the Mujeres Emprendedoras Community Bank. She is still working at her job selling vegetables such as carrots, lettuce etc. in one of the local markets in Cusco to all who seek to buy her produce. She wishes to keep on working so she can continue supporting her family.

Now she is seeking a loan to buy squash and other vegetables. She is very grateful to Kiva for supporting her work so she can provide for  her family.

loans.use: Buy squash and other vegetables

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
La socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de restaurante, la socia continúa preparando desayunos, almuerzo y cenas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar insumos como arroz entre otros.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
The borrower continues to work at her restaurant business. She continues preparing breakfasts, lunches, and dinners. She is a responsible and persevering person. She wants to be able to continue working in order to continue supporting her family in this way.

She is asking for the loan in order to buy supplies such as rice, among other items.

She is thankful for and values the loan, and she promises to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as rice, among other items

loans.name: Nurbubu

texts.ru: Нурбубу 52 года, замужем, есть дети. У Нурбубу - среднее образование, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством, стартовав в 2004 году с покупки скота, благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Нурбубу, на сегодняшний день у нее в хозяйстве есть: 1 дойная корова, 1 теленок, 1 нетель и 20 овец. Также в сезон Нурбубу занимается полеводством и торговлей. В собственном павильоне она продает местным жителям продуктовые товары. В целях дальнейшего развития своей животноводческой деятельности, Нурбубу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) для покупки 1 бычка на 40,000 сом (KGS), овец на сумму 20,000 сом (KGS), и корма для скота на оставшиеся средства. Скот Нурбубу намерена перепродавать на местном скотном рынке, а доходы от кредита она направит на дальнейшее увеличить поголовья скота, что приведет к получению большей совокупной прибыли от перепродажи скота и мяса. Бизнес Нурбубу по ее замыслу должен помочь накопить средства на образование ее внуков.
texts.en: Nurbubu is 52 years old, married and has children. Nurbubu has a secondary education and, to provide an additional source of income for her family, has been involved in animal husbandry since 2004 and started with a purchase of livestock. Thanks to Nurbubu's drive and hard work, today her business contains 1 dairy cow, 1 calf, 1 heifer and 20 sheep. Also, Nurbubu is involved in farming and sales during the season. She sells food products to local residents from her own store. In order to further develop her business, Nurbubu requested a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy 1 bull with 40,000 som (KGS), sheep with 20,000 som (KGS) and livestock feed with the remaining amount. Nurbubu plans to resell the livestock at a local livestock market and use the earnings from the loan into further increasing livestock headcount, which would lead to earning a larger total profit from sales of livestock and meat. Nurbubu's idea is that the business should help save money for her grandchildren's education.

loans.use: to buy a bull, sheep and livestock feed

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is an elderly, single woman who has worked very hard throughout her life to not only support herself, but to raise her two children on her own. Over 29 years ago, Gloria began working with sick and handicapped children in the neonatal unit of a hospital in southern Florida. Gloria never missed a day of work because she knew how much these children depended on her care and they had the comfort of knowing she wouldn’t let them down. Unfortunately, Gloria was forced into retirement due to a health condition that made it impossible to keep up with her physically demanding job. Due to Gloria’s health, her mobility has been greatly diminished and her pain is only intensified by Florida’s heat. Within the last few years, she has strived to remain as independent as possible, and with the help of her live-in daughter, she has been able to continue to live safely in her own home and avoid placement into an assisted living facility. Gloria will use her loan to pay for a new air conditioner that will replace her old unit that is over 20 years old. This new unit will lower her current energy bill, be better for the environment and help Gloria have a better quality of life, honoring all her years of hard work.

loans.use: to pay for a new A/C unit that will provide a more comfortable living space for Gloria.

loans.name: Elena Petrona

texts.es:
Elena es una mujer de 25 años de edad, casada madre de un hijo y su actividad es la fisioterapia.
Ella es una persona alegre y sencilla, su carácter es muy amistoso y es muy conversadora, su trabajo lo realiza en la ciudad de Santa Cruz, una zona caracterizada por altas temperaturas durante todo el año y la humedad de su ambiente, su anterior actividad fue la venta de cosméticos, debido a que finalizó su carrera ahora ella se dedica a la fisioterapia.
Elena es de estatura mediana, tez morena y cabello negro, sus manos son suaves y pequeñas, ella alquila un local en su barrio para trabajar y estar cerca de su casa porque su hijo es muy pequeño todavía.
Ella se dedica a la fisioterapia una disciplina de la Salud que ofrece una alternativa terapéutica no farmacológica, para paliar síntomas de múltiples dolencias, tanto agudas como crónicas, por medio del ejercicio terapéutico, calor, frío, luz, agua, masaje y electricidad. su labor tiene algunas necesidades como son; cremas y equipos para masajes, ella desea tener un consultorio fijo donde poder trabajar y no cambiar constantemente de dirección, su esposo la colabora con el cuidado de su niño y con la limpieza de su sala de fisioterapia.
Es por esos motivos que Elena solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina masajeadora y el alquiler de un lugar fijo dónde poder trabajar.
texts.en:
Elena is a 25 year old woman, married with a son, and her business is physiotherapy. She used to sell cosmetics, but she finished that career and is now dedicated to physiotherapy.  She is a happy and modest person, her personality is very friendly and she is very talkative. She works in the city of Santa Cruz, an area known for its high temperatures throughout the year and for the humidity of the air. 

Elena is of average height, with tanned skin and black hair, and her hands are soft and small.  She rents a shop in her neighborhood so she can work and be close to home, because her son is still very small.  

She is dedicated to physiotherapy, a discipline of health studies, that offers an alternative approach to therapy that does not involve the use of pharmaceuticals, in order to alleviate the symptoms of many ailments, both acute and chronic. She does this through therapeutic exercise and treatments with heat, cold, light, water, massage, and electricity. Her shop has necessities like lotions and equipment for massages.  She would like to have a permanent office where she can work and not have to constantly move for her clients at different locations.  She and her husband work together to take care of their son and clean the physiotherapy room.

For these reasons, Elena is requesting a loan to buy a massage machine and to rent a permanent location where she can work.

loans.use: to purchase a massage machine and to rent a place where she can work with her clients.

loans.name: Henry Ernesto

texts.es: Henry de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica  al cultivo de maíz y loroco, comercializa en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran por su casa, con lo que gana de sus ventas ayuda a solventar algunas necesidades de su hogar, Henry solicita un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para continuar con sus cultivos y así poder darle a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Henry, 30 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and his son. He grows corn and loroco [a vine with edible flowers used in Salvadoran food]. He sells at the different markets around his house. With what he earns from his sales, he helps to cover some of his household's necessities. Henry is asking for a loan in order to buy fertilizer, manure, pest control products, etc., and to improve the land shown in the photograph in order to continue with his crops and in this way be able to give his family what it needs with no limitations.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, pest control products, etc., and to improve the land

loans.name: El Calvario Group

texts.es: Juana Porfiria es una persona de 38 años de edad, (en la foto aparece en medio), vive en el municipio de Sololá, departamento de Sololá, tiene 10 hijos; 6 hombres y 4 mujeres, ella se dedica a actividades agrícolas, cultiva cebolla y ejote y de allí obtiene sus ingresos, es una persona muy entusiasta, vio la oportunidad de aprovechar un lote de terreno para cultivar y generar un ingreso para su familia, también el clima favorece al cultivo de cebolla que es un clima cálido, también trabaja en oficios domésticos cuando no está en su parcela, Juan Porfiria necesita un crédito para comprar insumos (semilla de cebolla, abono químico, abono orgánico) para el cultivo de cebolla, la meta de ella es cultivar más lotes de cebolla e incrementar la calidad de su cultivo.
texts.en:
Juana Porfiria, age 38, pictured in the middle above, lives in the town of Sololá in the department of the same name. She has ten children -- six boys and four girls -- and is in the business of farming. She raises onions and green beans and earns her income from these.  She's an enthusiastic person who saw opportunity in a plot of land for her to cultivate it and earn an income. Additionally, the warm climate is good for onions. When she's not working her land, she's working by providing household services. 

Juana Porfiria needs this loan to buy supplies, such as seed onions, chemical fertilizer, and natural fertilizer, which will help her grow crops. Her goal is to cultivate more parcels of onions and improve the quality of her produce.

loans.use: buy supplies for growing onions

loans.name: Sergio Fermin

texts.es:
Sergio es un hombre joven de 21 años de edad soltero, sin hijos y su negocio es la artesanía en totora.
Él es una persona sencilla, alegre y muy apasionado por su arte; cuando terminó la escuela primaria las posibilidades de continuar con los estudios eran nulas y se dedicó a trabajar enteramente en el tejido de lana de alpaca y al trenzado de la totora, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la zona de ‘huatajata’ que es uno de los principales destinos turísticos vinculado al lago Titicaca(distante a tres horas de la ciudad capital, La Paz), esta es una de las poblaciones que presenta los más elevados índices de pobreza del lugar.
Sergio es de baja estatura, tez morena, cabello negro corto y expone sus productos en inmediaciones de la plaza principal al aire libre, todos los días por la mañana se dirige al lugar transportando sus prendas de vestir y obras de arte en totora y las ordena para su exposición y venta. A pesar de su juventud él cuenta con muchos sueños y metas como; la construcción de un museo de balsas de totora, que contenga información sobre las exploraciones náuticas de las embarcaciones antiguas de las balsas de totora, la formación del lago Titicaca y sus características, además del ecosistema e historia, esto para incrementar la visita de turistas y así ayudar a su comunidad y su familia mejorando los ingresos económicos del lugar.
Es por esos motivos que Sergio solicita un préstamo para comprar material de construcción y así construir el museo de balsas de totora y ayudar al turismo de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Sergio, age 21, is single and has no children. His business is in totora reed craftsmanship.  He is a simple man, happy and passionate about his art. When he finished primary school, he had no chance of continuing with his schooling, so he devoted himself entirely to work in weaving alpaca wool and braiding totora reed. His business is in the 'huatajata' area, one of the main tourist areas associated with Lake Titicaca, located some three hours from the capital of La Paz. This population has some of the highest levels of poverty in the region.

Sergio is short, and dark-complected with short black hair. He displays his products in an open air space right by the main plaza. Every morning, he makes for his spot, carrying his clothing items and his totora reed works of art, and he sets them up for display and sale. In spite of his youth, he has big dreams and goals, such as building a museum of totora reed rafts. The museum would have information about nautical explorations undertaken in the ancient rafts, about the formation of Lake Titicaca, its characteristics, its ecosystem, and its history. This would increase tourist visits and help both his community and his family, increasing income throughout the area.

With these goals, Sergio is requesting a loan for the construction materials he needs to build his museum of totora reed rafts and build tourism in his community.

loans.use: open a museum about totora reed rafts and Lake Titicaca

loans.name: Mirtala

texts.es: Mirtala, tiene 25  años de edad,  es casada, tiene 2 hijos, reside en compañía de su familia en una comunidad del municipio de Victoria, Yoro. Mirtala, aprendió la agricultura de sus padres desde muy pequeña, ella en este momento se dedica a la producción de maíz para la venta. También tiene cría de cerdos y gallinas lo que le genera otros ingresos.  Ha decidido obtener el cuarto préstamo con ODEF por la cantidad de 20,000 Lempiras los que invertirá en el pago de mano de obra y compra de fertilizantes e insumos para la asistencia técnica del cultivo de maíz. Ella espera mejorar los rendimientos productivos y la calidad del grano, lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos. Continua con su meta de darles estudio a sus hijos y mantener siempre su fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
25-year old Mirtala is married and has two children. She lives with her family in the municipality of Victoria, Yoro. She learned about farming from her parents when she was a young girl and now grows maize to sell. She also raises pigs and chickens to generate further income.

Mirtala has decided to obtain another loan of 20,000 lempiras from ODEF to hire laborers and buy fertilizer and other supplies for her maize crop. She hopes to improve production and the quality of the corn, which will allow her to earn more money. Her goals are still to provide her children with a good education and to always have a good source of income.

loans.use: Buy fertilizer and other supplies for her maize crop

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina es una mujer de 56 años de edad casada sin hijos y se dedica a la producción de queso.
Ella es de carácter humilde, trabajadora, fuerte y luchadora, su vida gira alrededor de la producción de leche y la ganadería, en la provincia de batallas distante a dos horas de la ciudad capital (La Paz).
Paulina es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo trenzado, y viste de forma tradicional (manta y pollera), su hogar se encuentra situado en las cercanías al lago Titicaca, el clima del lugar es bastante frío y los rayos del sol muy fuertes, durante el día calientan mucho, por la noche las bajas temperaturas congelan los pastizales del ganado. La vida del lugar es bastante difícil y se debe caminar distancias largas para alimentar al ganado, eso no incomoda a Paulina porque está acostumbrada al trabajo duro. Ella tiene necesidades para continuar con la producción de queso, necesita aumentar su producción lechera mediante la compra de ganado vacuno para mejorar sus ingresos y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Es por esos motivos que Paulina solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado vacuno y mejorar la producción de queso.
texts.en:
Paulina is a 56-year-old woman, married with no children. She makes cheese.

She is a humble, hard-working, strong fighter. Her life revolves around milk production and cattle ranching in Batallas province, two hours from the capital city (La Paz).

Paulina has brown skin, is of medium height, has long braided black hair, and dresses in the traditional manner (manta and pollera). Her home is near Lake Titicaca. The climate of the place is rather cold and the sun's rays are very strong. During the day it gets very hot; at night the low temperatures freeze the cattle pastures. The life there is rather hard, and one has to walk long distances in order to feed the cattle. This doesn't bother Paulina because she is used to hard work. She has needs in order to continue making cheese. She needs to increase her milk production by buying cattle in order to improve her income and in this way improve her family's quality of life.

Those are the reasons why Paulina is asking for a loan in order to buy cattle and improve cheese production.

loans.use: to buy cattle and improve cheese production and the life of her family

loans.name: Daniel Jesus

texts.es:
Daniel proviene de un hogar de padres separados y vive actualmente con su madre y sus dos hermanos menores. En casa no tienen noticias del padre ya que este no aporta a los gastos de la casa, ni siquiera por sus hermanos que aun son menores de edad.
Su madre vende ropa en la calle de manera ambulante y es el único sustento del hogar, ella se a esforzado mucho para que su hijo mayor, Daniel, pueda seguir estudiando, pero actualmente el dinero no le alcanza porque la ayuda que recibía de su hijo por las practicas remuneradas que hacia a terminado porque estas concluyeron.
Daniel esta cursando su ultimo ciclo en la carrera de diseño industrial y esta a solo meses de graduarse, sin embargo esto no sera posible sin la ayuda de los prestamistas de Kiva.
El esta ansioso de poder culminar sus estudios para poder comenzar a trabajar y ayudar en casa a su madre y hermanos. El es el mayor de tres hermanos y como tal quiere ser un ejemplo a seguir para los menores, que estudien y se esfuercen por salir adelante.
Daniel confía y agradece a los prestamistas de Kiva por su gran apoyo a la educación y en su caso particular, a darle ese ultimo impulso que necesita para poder culminar sus estudios de manera exitosa.
texts.en:
Daniel comes from a home where his parents were separated. He currently lives with his mother and his two younger siblings. They haven't had any news from the father back home, as he doesn't support the family, not even the two younger boys who are still minors.  His mother works as a traveling salesperson, selling clothing through the streets. This is the family's only income. She's worked hard so that her oldest child, Daniel, could continue with his schooling, but now the money won't stretch. The support she received from her son's paid internship has run out now that the work has ended.  Daniel is enrolling in his last term in his Industrial Design program, and he's just months from graduating. Nevertheless, it won't be possible without the support of Kiva lenders.

Daniel is anxious to finish his schooling so that he can start working and help his mother and brothers. He's the oldest of the three children, and he wants to set a good example for the younger ones, encouraging them to stay in school and work hard to get ahead.  Daniel is confident and grateful to the Kiva lenders for their support of his education, and in this particular case, this final push that he needs to finish his schooling successfully.

loans.use: complete his last semester of school successfully

loans.name: Gilma Yesenia

texts.es: Gilma de 20 años de edad habita en casa propia con su grupo familiar. Ella es una joven emprendedora que desde muy joven le ha gustado trabajar por lo que desde hace 4 años administra una pequeña tienda, además vende verduras y hortalizas. Gilma desea construir un pequeño patio en su vivienda por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar polines, lámina galvanizada y cemento, además pagará mano de obra para la construcción del patio en su vivienda.
texts.en: Gilma, age 20, lives in her own home with her family. She's a young entrepreneur who has liked to work ever since she was very young. She has four years of experience running a small store, and she also sells vegetables and produce. Gilma wants to build a small patio on her home, which is why she has come to FUSAI. The loan will be used to buy construction beams, sheet metal, and cement, and also to pay for the manual labor for the construction.

loans.use: build a patio onto her home.

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es: Evangelina de 47 años de edad vive en casa alquilada con su grupo familiar conformado por sus cuatro hijos,  ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pupusas, con lo que vende logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Evangelina solicita un crédito para la compra de materia prima como: maíz, frijol, chicharrón, quesillo, tomates, etc. Para seguir con sus ventas y  darle a su familia un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: Evangelina, 47, lives in a rented house with her family group composed of her four children.  She makes a living making and selling stuffed tortillas.  With what she sells, she is able to meet the expenses that come up in her home.  Evangelina is requesting a loan to buy raw materials, such as corn, beans, cracklings, cheese, tomatoes, etc. in order to continue with her sales and give her family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cracklings, cheese, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en:
Alejandra is 59 years old and married with three children. 

Alejandra is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Alejandra requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her business.

Alejandra has been raising livestock for 8 years now, and has previously borrowed three loans from NWTF to sustain her business.

Alejandra would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy notebooks, pens, erasers, colored boxes, etc. wholesale.

loans.name: Ricina

texts.en:
Hello, Kiva Lenders! Meet Ricina, a charming mother who always has a smile on her face that makes her glow. She is 36 years old, and she hails from the Kisii area of Kenya. Kisii is one of the most fertile places on earth, where bananas are grown as a cash crop. Ricina is a dedicated farmer who practices mixed farming; that is, she grows crops and also keeps dairy cows as a source of income. Ricina has so much passion for dairy farming, and she loves taking care of her cows. She has even nicknamed one of her cows “Maridadi,” which means beautiful. That is what the cow does to her life: it makes Ricina's life beautiful.

Ricina is a mother of three children. She has fought to raise them. Through her hard work she has managed to always provide for them the basic needs in life. Although, she has always had challenges because of lack of sufficient income.

Ricina is very enterprising and wants to utilize the large space on her farm for dairy farming. One challenge that she is facing is lack of enough capital to buy more dairy cows. She is seeking a loan of 52,000 KES to buy a dairy cow. Kisii area is an area that has good weather patterns that support dairy farming. Hence, Ricina is sure to reap more profits than ever. Through increased milk production Ricina will be able to satisfy the demand for milk in this area, which will translate to more profits.

Ricina is so passionate about providing a secure future for her children. Knowing that there are people out there and institutions like Kiva that support and generate progress, she feels relieved and knows that her dream will be accomplished. Ricina will use the profits from selling milk to repay the loan and to educate her children. Ricina believes that education is the only way that you can reduce poverty levels.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Jesús Alberto

texts.es:
Jesús es el mayor de tres hermanos, vive con ellos y su madre, ya que proviene de un hogar de padres separados. Su padre colabora económicamente solo cuando puede, ya que actualmente tiene otra pareja y familia. 
Su madre es secretaria y es junto con el, gracias a un pequeño negocio de alquiler de equipo de sonido, los que mantienen el hogar.
El gasto que involucra la educación de sus hermanos menores y el mantenimiento de la casa hacen muy difícil el pago de la cuota de su instituto, por lo cual necesita cuotas mas cómodas para poder seguir pagando a tiempo sus estudios y continuar con ellos, de lo contrario deberá abandonarlos para trabajar y ahorrar hasta reunir lo suficiente para poder cubrir el monto necesario, de no contar con el apoyo de los prestamistas de Kiva.
Jesús se convertiría en el primero en su familia en tener una carrera profesional siendo un ejemplo para sus hermanos menores y motivo de orgullo para su madre, es por esto que el les solicita y agradece el apoyo que puedan brindarle los prestamistas de Kiva por intermedio de este préstamo estudiantil, ya que con el podría manejar cuotas mas bajas que podría pagar y así cumplir su sueño mas próximo de culminar sus estudios en mecánica de mantenimiento que le permitan en un futuro poner su taller propio donde podrían practicar jóvenes talentosos y necesitados de un apoyo como el.
texts.en:
Jesús is the oldest of three siblings, and lives with the other two children and their mother, who is separated from their father. Their father helps financially when he can, but now has another partner and a new family.  Jesús' mother is a secretary, and he runs a small business renting sound equipment. Together, they support the family. 

The cost of the younger children's education and supporting the household makes it very hard for Jesús to pay tuition at the institute where he studies. He therefore needs a more flexible payment plan to cover tuition and continue his studies. Without the support of Kiva lenders, Jesús will have to leave school to work until he's saved enough to pay the tuition.   

Jesús is ready to become the first person in his family to establish a professional career, serve as an example to his younger siblings, and become a source of pride for his mother. He is therefore applying for a loan and is grateful for the support that Kiva lenders. The student loan that they are making possible will allow him to lower his tuition payments to an affordable level and achieve his immediate goal of finishing his studies in mechanical maintenance. With this education and training, Jesús will be able to set up his own shop one day, where he'll be able to train talented but deprived young people who need the support of people like him.

loans.use: to continue his technical studies and improve his family's situation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase Play Station devices and X-Box devices and to renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Luis Francisco

texts.es:
Luis Francisco es un joven de 31 años, nació en La Paz – Bolivia, es soltero y vive con sus padres y su hermano menor. Su papá es jubilado y es el principal sustento de su hogar ya que su mamá se dedica al cuidado de su hermano quien tiene capacidades diferentes. 
Luis Francisco nos comenta que en un inicio decidió estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería de Sistemas, sin embargo no pudo continuarla pues sintió que no era su verdadera vocación, posteriormente ingresó a un instituto donde culmino con éxito sus estudios a nivel técnico medio en Programación de Sistemas. 
Luis Francisco es un gran deportista, desde hace 14 años que practica las artes marciales, esto le ayudo a formar su carácter y responsabilidad, participó en varios campeonatos internacionales y represento al país en varias ocasiones y es que por medio de este deporte que se le abrieron las puertas para solicitar una media beca deportiva para ingresar nuevamente a la Universidad y estudiar lo que más le apasiona que es la carrera de Comercio Internacional, ahora él solicita un crédito educativo para poderse titular ya que se encuentra en la etapa final de su carrera. 
Su más grande desafío es ser una mejor persona cada día y ser un gran profesional ya que considera que esta es la mejor manera de agradecer a su familia todo el amor y apoyo que le han brindado. Su sueño es tener su propia empresa dedicada al comercio internacional y así mejorar su situación económica para poder apoyar a su familia. 
Luis Francisco agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos le están dando la oportunidad de culminar sus estudios para ser un gran profesional boliviano.
texts.en:
Luis Francisco is 31 years old. He was born in La Paz, Bolivia, he is single, and lives with his parents and his younger brother. His father is retired and provides the main support for the family, since his mother is devoted to the care of his brother who has disabilities.

Luis Francisco tells us that initially he decided to study systems engineering, however he could not continue with it because he felt it was not his true vocation. Later he enrolled in an institute where he successfully completed his system programming studies at the middle technical level.

Luis Francisco is a keen athlete. He has been practicing martial arts for 14 years. This helped him to develop his character and responsibility. He participated in several international competitions, representing the country on several occasions. It was through this sport that doors were opened to him to apply for an athletic half-tuition scholarship in order to enroll again in the university and study that which he is most passionate about, international trade.

He is now requesting an educational loan to graduate, since he is in the final stage of his career studies. His biggest challenge is being a better person each day and a great professional, he considers this to be the best way to thank his family for all the love and support they have provided him. His dream is to have his own company dedicated to international trade, thus improving his financial situation to be able to support his family.

Luis Francisco is thankful to the people who, through their financial resources, are giving him the opportunity to complete his studies to become an outstanding Bolivian professional.

loans.use: to pay for his degree in international trade.

loans.name: Dora Luz

texts.es: Dora Luz aun trabaja vendiendo pan y café de forma ambulante, oficio que le permitió poder pagar el crédito anterior, juntando también los ingresos de su esposo. Con este nuevo crédito, Dora Luz comprará materiales de construcción para hacer un cuarto, debido al monto solicitado y a los ingresos de su familia, en el futuro solicitará un crédito para pagar la mano de obra para la construcción de su cuarto, y así poder terminar de sus planes que junto a su familia se ha fijado.
texts.en:
Dora Luz still works selling bread and coffee in an itinerant manner.  This work has allowed her to be able to repay the previous loan, which she did by also adding her husband’s earnings.  

With this new loan Dora Luz will buy construction materials to make a room.  Due to the requested amount and her family’s income, in the future she will request a loan to pay for the labor to build the room.  This way she will be able to complete the plans that she and her family have in the making.

loans.use: to build a room in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more used clothes and bags to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil and rice

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Juan tiene 44 años de edad es casado y tiene 02 hijos, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de agencia de viajes, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, el socio vende diferentes tipos de paquetes como City Tours, Valle Sagrado entre otros, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de boletos turísticos.
EL socio se siente agradecido por el  crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Mujeres Emprendedoras communal bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco province in the Cusco department.

Juan, age 44, is married and has two children.  He alternates his daily activities with his business, a travel agency.  He has been in the business for a good amount of time.  It is going well for him thanks to the effort that he puts into his business every day.  He sells different types of packages like City Tours, Sacred Valley, and others.  The member wishes to be able to continue working in this way in order to continue supporting his family.

He is requesting the loan to buy tourist tickets.

The member is grateful for the loan that was granted, and he pledges to make his payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy tourist tickets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more bags of native rice to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more coal to sell.

loans.name: Youmna

texts.en:
Youmna is a 37-year-old married mother of three, who in 2009, opened a home products sales shop to support her husband in increasing their family's income and developing their living.

Youmna is a hard worker, who puts so much effort on developing her business, through diversifying the displayed items. In addition to home products, Youmna sells makeup, perfumes and accessories. She has a dream, which she is working hard to make true, to open a wider shop and increase her business merchandise, to develop her children's living through providing a better education.

Today, Youmna is acquiring her third loan cycle from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to increase her business merchandise with special new released home products with encouraging prices.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en:
This is 39-year-old Georgina. She is single and she has three children from her late sister to take care of. 

She has been supplying water, jewelries and gari for 10 years. She attended school to the secondary level. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns a fairly good monthly profit from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of GHS 4,000. Georgina requires a loan in order to buy water, jewelries and gari for resale. In the future, Georgina plans to expand her business, to generate more income, to educate her sister's children up to the university level, and to expand her business. She is very hardworking. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy water, jewelries and gari for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to obtain a water pump for irrigation

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to obtain a water pump for irrigation

loans.name: Isaac

texts.en:
Isaac, age 33, is a farmer in Chisamba District, Zambia. Isaac has been growing onions, tomatoes, watermelon and butternut squash to sell to buyers at local markets. He plans to get a water pump that will help him realize his goals of further expanding his farm.

Water pumps can be a major boost for rural farmers such as Isaac, who often struggle to irrigate their crops using watering cans and buckets. A water pump allows for farmers to water their crops more regularly, while also increasing the area they are able to cultivate. Unfortunately, the upfront costs of such a water pump can be very prohibitive. 

Rent to Own has worked with Isaac on a business plan for this gardening season and will deliver a water pump directly to his farm. Rent to Own also provides Isaac with training on how to properly use and maintain the water pump, and will check in to provide support until he has paid off the loan.

loans.use: to obtain a water pump for irrigation

loans.name: Moeun's Group

texts.en: Moeun’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Moeun makes a living cultivating rice with her family and her son also does extra work as a farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Chanthoeurn's Group

texts.en: Chanthoeurn’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Chanthoeurn makes a living cultivating rice and selling furniture. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Sopheap's Group

texts.en: Sopheap’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sopheap makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Soknoeun's Group

texts.en: Soknoeun’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Soknoeun makes a living cultivating rice and fishing. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Kim's Group

texts.en: Kim’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Kim makes a living cultivating rice, fishing and raising pigs. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Sokchea's Group

texts.en: Sokchea’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Sokchea makes a living cultivating rice and fishing, she also does extra work as farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more slippers and lappas to sell.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina tiene 53 años de edad, vive en el Distrito de Morropon, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comida y bebida a pensionistas fijos con los cuales viene trabajando hace más de 2 años, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de materiales de construcción para su casa y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is 53 years old. She lives in the district of Morropon, a community with a hot climate. Its people work in agriculture, commerce, and livestock raising. It belongs to the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.

She sells food and beverages to regular boarders with whom she has been working for more than 2 years. She has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 PEN to purchase construction materials for her house and in this way to generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to complete the finishing of her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more salt, fish, pepper and sugar for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 25 años de edad vive en la casa de su tío con su grupo familiar conformado de su  compañera de vida y su hijo, el es una persona muy honesta y trabajadora, desde hace 3 años se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz,  con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunas necesidades de su hogar, el cliente solicita un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para continuar con sus cultivos y así poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 25 years old and lives with his family, which consists of his life companion and his son, in his uncle’s house, He is a very honest and hardworking person who has been farming for 3 years. His principal crop is corn. He has been able to pay for some of his household’s necessities with his earnings.

The client is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest controls and herbicides, etc., and to improve the land that is shown in the photo so that he can continue farming. This will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest controls and herbicides, etc., and to improve his land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, salt, red oil, onion etc. to sell.

loans.name: Micah

texts.en:
Micah is a 26-year-old Maasai from Tanzania. His hometown is situated in Simanjiro, South of Mount Kilimanjaro. Like many men of his tribe, he moved to the big city Dar es Salaam to try his luck as a security guard. For his job he earns about 100 USD per month. Despite this bad income, there was something good about the job: during the time he got in contact with many English speaking people and that's why he is (apart from Maasai language and Swahili) also fluent in English. 
In the past year Micah has been given a loan to start his solar energy business in order to bring renewable energy to his home town Simanjiro. He now wants to expand his business in order to reach more villages and more people in his area. He needs a loan of $8000 in order to buy solar products that he can store in his shop. Help him to make his vision come true: that all people in his area will use instead of kerosene solar energy systems.

loans.use: to expand his solar energy business to reach more customers

loans.name: Mujeres De Vision Group

texts.en:
These five Visionary women live in the small community of Tierras del Pueblo in the Suchitepéquez Department of Guatemala. They all work in the clothing industry, sewing and selling typical Guatemalan blouses and skirts. They chose the name for their group when they started working with Namaste because they strongly believe in themselves and have a clear vision of where they want to see themselves in the future.  They are now starting their second loan cycle with Namaste. They grew their businesses and learned a lot, from their classes and from their Business Adviser, during their first nine-month cycle and are eager to have more financial literacy classes and more advice in order to grow their businesses even more.
One of these entrepreneurial women is Sara (second from left) who is 52 years old and married with one child still in school.  She has only a third grade education but she is a smart business woman who is proud of her little store which she has had for ten years.  Her husband works as a construction worker and helps her support the family. She sells, from a storefront that is part of her house, the blouses, skirts and belts that the Guatemalan women wear.
During the first loan cycle she learned many useful things such as how to keep her sales and expenses in a notebook and how to separate her personal money from her business money.  Using the advice from her Business Adviser she increased her income by 50%.  Her goal for this cycle is to offer in her store sewing materials that other seamstresses are looking for in the community.  Her goal is to increase her net income at her shop and get closer to her dream:  to invest some of her money in her house in order to create better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase sewing materials for her store to sell to other seamstresses in her community

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is a married woman and has 2 dependent children. She describes herself to be honest, and she operates a retail business where she sells ready-made dresses, underwear and slippers.  She has been involved in this business for 8 years. Her business is located at her residence. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be competition. She will use the 2,600 GHS loan to buy more stock of ready-made dresses, underwear and slippers.  Her business goal is to be a wholesaler within 5 years. This is her ninth loan with ID Ghana and her previous loans have been repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of ready-made dresses, underwear and slippers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more flour, sugar and cooking oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “Mujeres Emprendedoras”, la socia  Natividad tiene 55 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la enseñanza, la socia es docente de  profesión, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante.
 La socia solicita el crédito  para su uso personal como víveres entre otros.

La socia está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse en su actividad y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
The member, Natividad, is 55 years old, single and belongs to the communal bank Mujeres Emprendedoras [Entrepreneurial Woman]. She alternates her daily activities, making a living from teaching. She is a teacher by profession, responsible and earnest and in this way is successful.

The member is requesting this loan for her personal use such as food supplies, amongst others. The member is very thankful for KIVA for allowing her to keep up with her work and support her family.

loans.use: to buy personal goods such as food supplies, amongst others.

loans.name: Adilia Del Carmen

texts.es: Adilia de 41 años de edad posee una venta de aguas, gaseosas, refrescos, etc. desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en una zona muy estratégica cerca de su lugar de residencia, Adilia vive en casa propia su esposo y sus seis hijos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Adilia, 41 years old, has had a business selling water and soft drinks, etc., for several years. Her business is located in a very strategic area near her home. Adilia lives in her own home with her husband and six children.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more products wholesale in order to continue with her sales and give her family a better quality life without any restrictions.

loans.use: to purchase water and soft drinks, etc., wholesale

loans.name: Yanira Lisseth

texts.es: Yanira de 31 años de edad vive en casa alquilada desde hace seis años junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, desde hace 14 años ella se dedica  al cultivo de maíz y frijol, y adicional a eso se dedica  a la venta de ropa, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego venderlos, con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Yanira  solicita un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y asi darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Yanira, who is 31 years old, has lived in a rented house with her husband and their two children for six years. She is a very hard-working and responsible person. For 14 years she has grown corn and beans, and in addition to this she sells clothing. When her harvest is ready, she stores it in the bins that are shown in the photograph to sell later. With the earnings that she obtains from her work and with the help of her husband, they manage to pay some household expenses. Yanira is applying for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, etc., and to thus give her family what they need without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice and cooking seasoning to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve the infrastructure of her home

loans.name: Gilma Irene

texts.es: Gilma de 47 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 12 años, su principal cultivo es el maíz, Gilma vive en casa propia con su esposo, y con dos de sus tres hijos, el mayor es independiente pero le ayuda económicamente para el hogar, son personas muy responsables y trabajadoras, que siempre están buscando la manera de salir adelante a pesar de las dificultades que se les presentan,  Gilma solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, herbicidas, foliares, etc. para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Gilma is 47 years old and has been making a living in agriculture for the last 12 years. Her main crop is corn. Gilma lives in her own house with her husband and two of their three children. The oldest child is independent but but helps her economically with the household. They are very responsible and hardworking people who are always looking for a way to continue moving forward despite the difficulties they face. Gilma is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, herbicides, foliar products, etc., to be able to have a better quality of life without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, herbicides, foliar products, etc.

loans.name: Edwar Joseph

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Edwar  tiene 28 años de edad y es soltero, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando para una empresa  estatal  el socio lleva buen tiempo trabajando para dicha empresa el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su trabajo, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando  para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para su uso personal como en la compra de vivieres.
EL socio se siente agradecido por el  crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Edwar belongs to the 'Mujeres Emprendedoras' communal bank. The bank is located in the province and department of Cusco.

Edwar is 28 years old and is single. He divides his time between his daily activities and working for a state company. He has been working for said company for some time and it is going well thanks to the effort he puts into his work every day. He hopes to keep working in this manner so he can continue to support his family.

He is requesting a loan for his personal use, such as for buying groceries. The loan recipient is grateful for this loan and promises to comply with the established payment terms.

loans.use: to buy items for his personal use, such as groceries.

loans.name: Sukarta

texts.en: Meet Sukarta. He is a hardworking man who lives with his wife in Depok, a satellite city located at the south of Jakarta. Currently, Sukarta and his wife do not have a child but they are planning to. To meet his family's needs, Sukarta runs a small stall that sells mobile phone accessories, mobile airtime credits and some snacks and drinks. He began working with Ruma 6 months ago because he wanted to increase his income and he's also interested in expanding his networks. For the last two months, Sukarta's daily transaction from selling mobile phone airtime credits can be up to 75 per day and is expected to grow more, especially on the weekends. As the business continues, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva. In the photo, Sukarta is standing in front of his small stall.

loans.use: To process more mobile airtime credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Azer

texts.en: Azer is 43 years old, married and has two children. His family members are IDPs (İnternally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli City and currently living in Baku region. Azer’s wife is a teacher and his son goes to tenth class of school. His son is also engaged in painting. His daughter goes to eighth class. Azer is a taxi driver. Today he wants to repair his car’s interior. For this reason he has applied to Komak company for a loan in the amount of 600 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). Azer is thankful to Kiva organization and lenders for aid. In the future he wants to change the wheels of his car.

loans.use: to pay for repair of his car’s interior.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: pay for an architecture course

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy rice, salt, red oil, union meat, soft drinks etc. to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 21 años de edad  es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, vive en casa propia con su grupo familia quienes le ayudan en el negocio, el se dedica a la carpintería desde hace tres años elabora finos muebles, su taller lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene clientela establecida que lo prefieren por la calidad de los materiales que utiliza,  con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda a solventar algunas de las necesidades que se le presentan en su hogar, el cliente  solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para comprar madera y herramientas de carpintería, ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi podrá seguir ayudando a su familia sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
The client is 21 years old and is a very hardworking and responsible person. He lives in his own house with his family group, who help him with the business.

He has earned a living doing carpentry for three years. He makes fine furniture, and his workshop is located in his place of residence. He has established customers who prefer him because of the quality of materials he uses. The income he earns helps cover some of the necessities presented in his house.

The client is seeking a loan from Integral to buy wood and carpentry tools, as this is his only source of income. In this way, he can continue helping his family without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy wood and carpentry tools.

loans.name: Víctor

texts.es:
En Chichicastenango, tres niños varones de 8,10 y 12 años van corriendo hacia la escuela y contando a sus amiguitos de que su papá, don Víctor, de 29 años es vendedor de calzados para toda la familia desde hace 8 años.

Mientras en casa se quedan dos niñas de 3 y 6 años, hijas de don Víctor  acompañando a su padre en el negocio.

Mientras en la mente de don Víctor se cruza la idea de tener un local propio que le dé seguridad a su negocio y una atención mejorada para sus clientes como una de las mejores maneras de ofrecer una calidad de servicio.  Inmediatamente surge la necesidad de solicitar algún préstamo, factor único para la ampliación de su negocio.  

Y como resultado mejorar el sustento de la familia.
texts.en:
In Chichicastenango three boys, ages 8, 10, and 12, are running to school and telling their friends that their father, Victor, age 29, has been selling shoes for the whole family for eight years.  Meanwhile, there are two girls, ages 3 and 6, left at home.  Victor’s daughters accompany their father in the business.

An idea crosses Victor’s mind to have his own place, which will provide his business with security.   This would also enable better attention to his customers, one of the best ways to offer quality service.

Immediately, the need to request a loan arises.  It is the determining factor in order to expand his business. The result will be improving the support of his family.

loans.use: to expand his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more flour, sugar and cooking oil to prepare her cakes.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito 24 de mayo,  este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 44 años de edad,  está casada y de esta relación tienen un hijo de 11 años de edad, el cual estudia en escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña María junto al marido  desde hace 17 años tienen un restaurante en un local que arriendan en el centro de la ciudad, allí todos los días en las tardes y noches preparan  deliciosos platos, la especialidad es el arroz con menestra y pollo asado que es lo mas venden ya que es lo que prefieren sus clientes que día a día llegan hasta su establecimiento, este negocio siempre se ha mantenido por la sazón que ella le pone sus platos y la muy buena atención que ella y su marido le dan a su clientela, es así como ellos salen adelante tratando de darle lo mejor a su pequeño hijo.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son de mucha ayuda. Sus metas son darle lo mejor  a su hijo.
texts.en:
The loan group "24th of May" meets every two weeks in the city of Tosagua. This place is known as being very dynamic. The majority of its inhabitants work in agriculture and raising animals, since it is a zone with a lot of vegetation.

Señora Maria lives in this place. She is 44 years old. She is married, and from this relationship she has an 11-year-old son, who is in school. Her husband is a businessman.

For 17 years, Doña Maria, along with her husband, has had a restaurant in a place that they rent in the center of the city. There they prepare delicious dishes every day in the afternoons and evenings. Their specialty is rice with vegetable stew and roasted chicken, which is what they sell most, since it is what the everyday customers at their establishment prefer. This business has always continued because of the seasoning that she puts into her dishes and the very good attention that she and her husband give to their customers. This is how they get ahead, trying to give the best to their little son.

She is going to use this loan to purchase supplies to prepare her foods. She has been in the loan group since its beginning, and she likes it because the loans are a big help. Her goals are to give the best to her son.
